# <a name="change-font-or-font-size-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="789aa-102">Promena fonta ili veličine fonta u programu Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-102">Change font or font size in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="789aa-103">Kada čitate e-poštu, možete da koristite funkciju za zumiranje svog pregledača da biste povećali ili smanjili tekst na ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-103">When reading email, you can use your browser's zoom function to make the text on your screen larger or smaller.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="789aa-104">Da biste promenili font ili veličinu fonta prilikom pisanja poruke:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-104">To change the font or font size while composing a message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="789aa-105">Na dnu okna za pisanje izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-105">At the bottom of the compose pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="789aa-106">**Font** ili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-106">**Font** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="789aa-107">**Veličinu fonta**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-107">**Font size**.</span></span>
    
2. <span data-ttu-id="789aa-108">Odaberite font ili veličinu fonta koje želite da koristite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-108">Choose the font or font size you want to use.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="789aa-109">Ako ne vidite meni "Opcije oblikovanja" na dnu okna za pisanje, izaberite opciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-109">If you don't see the formatting options menu at the bottom of the compose pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="789aa-110">**Opcije oblikovanja**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-110">**Formatting options**.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="789aa-111">Više informacija potražite u članku [Promena veličine fonta u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/43a2137f-8c3c-46df-af4a-73a12c9bb86e).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="789aa-111">For more information, see [Change font size in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/43a2137f-8c3c-46df-af4a-73a12c9bb86e).</span></span>
